1.name: A Clockwork Orange
1.description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

2.name: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
2.description: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

3.name: The French Connection
3.description: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.

4.name: The Omega Man
4.description: Army doctor Robert Neville struggles to create a cure for the plague that wiped out most of the human race.

5.name: Fiddler on the Roof
5.description: In prerevolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant contends with marrying off three of his daughters while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

6.name: Dirty Harry
6.description: When a mad man calling himself 'the Scorpio Killer' menaces the city, tough as nails San Francisco Police Inspector Harry Callahan is assigned to track down and ferret out the crazed psychopath.

7.name: Solaris
7.description: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

8.name: Harold and Maude
8.description: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

9.name: The Last Picture Show
9.description: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied West Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

10.name: Summer of '42
10.description: During his summer vacation on Nantucket Island in 1942, a youth eagerly awaiting his first sexual encounter finds himself developing an innocent love for a young woman awaiting news on her soldier husband's fate in WWII.

11.name: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
11.description: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in WWII.

12.name: Giù la testa
12.description: An I.R.A. explosives expert on the run in Mexico meets an amoral Mexican bandit; together they are drawn into the Mexican revolution.

13.name: Diamonds Are Forever
13.description: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

14.name: Straw Dogs
14.description: A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.

15.name: Play Misty for Me
15.description: A brief fling between a male disc jockey and an obsessed female fan takes a frightening, and perhaps even deadly turn when another woman enters the picture.

16.name: The Beguiled
16.description: While imprisoned in a Confederate girls' boarding school, an injured Union soldier cons his way into each of the lonely women's hearts, causing them to turn on each other, and eventually, on him.

17.name: Klute
17.description: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

18.name: Walkabout
18.description: Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

19.name: Big Jake
19.description: In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Jacob McCandles' grandson and holds him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.

20.name: The Devils
20.description: In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier seeks to protect the city of Loudun from the corrupt establishment of Cardinal Richelieu. Hysteria occurs within the city when he is accused of witchcraft by a sexually repressed nun.

21.name: THX 1138
21.description: In the twenty-fifth century, a time when people have designations instead of names, a man, THX 1138, and a woman, LUH 3417, rebel against their rigidly controlled society.

22.name: Vanishing Point
22.description: During the 1970s, car delivery driver Kowalski delivers hot rods in record time but always runs into trouble with the highway cops.

23.name: Anand
23.description: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the full before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

24.name: Billy Jack
24.description: Ex-Green Beret hapkido expert saves wild horses from being slaughtered for dog food and helps protect a desert "freedom school" for runaway.

25.name: Carnal Knowledge
25.description: Chronicling the lifelong sexual development of two men who meet and befriend one another in college.

26.name: Mary, Queen of Scots
26.description: During the sixteenth century, the Catholic Mary, Queen of Scots engages in over two decades of religious and political conflict with her cousin, the Protestant Queen Elizabeth I of England, amidst political intrigue in her native land.

27.name: Shoot Out
27.description: A former bank robber searches for his double crossing partner who left him for dead, while having to look after a 6 year old girl.

28.name: Shaft
28.description: Cool black private eye John Shaft is hired by a crime lord to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

29.name: The Andromeda Strain
29.description: A group of scientists investigate a deadly new alien virus before it can spread.

30.name: Get Carter
30.description: When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.

31.name: W.R. - Misterije organizma
31.description: A homage to the work of psychologist Wilhelm Reich, matched with a story about a Yugoslavian girl's affair with a Russian skater. Sexual repression, social systems and the orgone theory are explored.

32.name: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
32.description: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

33.name: Il Decameron
33.description: An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's "Decameron".

34.name: Villain
34.description: In 1970s London, the Scotland Yard orchestrates the downfall of mob boss Vic Dakin after he crosses the line by blackmailing Members of Parliament.

35.name: Johnny Got His Gun
35.description: In this tragic, dark, anti-war satire, a patriotic young American in WW1 is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

36.name: Support Your Local Gunfighter
36.description: A con artist arrives in a mining town controlled by two competing companies. Both companies think he's a famous gunfighter and try to hire him to drive the other out of town.

37.name: Tang shan da xiong
37.description: A young man sworn to an oath of non-violence works with his cousins in an ice factory where they mysteriously begin to disappear.

38.name: The Tragedy of Macbeth
38.description: A ruthlessly ambitious Scottish lord seizes the throne with the help of his scheming wife and a trio of witches.

39.name: Morte a Venezia
39.description: While recovering in Venice, a sickly composer becomes dangerously fixated with a teenage boy.

40.name: The Panic in Needle Park
40.description: Follows the lives of heroin addicts who frequent "Needle Park" in New York City.

41.name: Wake in Fright
41.description: After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.

42.name: Hannie Caulder
42.description: After she is raped and her husband murdered, a woman hires a bounty hunter to instruct her in the use of a gun so she can get her revenge on the three outlaws responsible.

43.name: Ecologia del delitto
43.description: The murder of a wealthy heiress by her husband triggers a series of brutal killings in the surrounding bay area.

44.name: Schulmädchen-Report 2. Teil - Was Eltern den Schlaf raubt
44.description: 10 vignettes about scandalous behavior of horny German schoolgirls. First, a strict, conservative teacher is lured by three of his beautiful, nubile young female students into a compromising situation with tragic results.

45.name: Two-Lane Blacktop
45.description: 2 men drag-racing across the U.S., in a '55 Chevy. Dennis Wilson's the mechanic, James Taylor's the driver.

46.name: The Last Movie
46.description: After a film production wraps in Peru, an American wrangler decides to stay behind, witnessing how filmmaking affects the locals.

47.name: Sometimes a Great Notion
47.description: A family of fiercely independent Oregon loggers struggle to keep the family business alive amidst changing times.

48.name: Valdez Is Coming
48.description: A Mexican-American sheriff must resort to violence against a powerful rancher in order to get just compensation for the pregnant Indian widow of a wrongly killed black man.

49.name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
49.description: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

50.name: A New Leaf
50.description: Henry Graham lives the life of a playboy. When his lawyer tells him one day that his lifestyle has consumed all his funds, he needs an idea to avoid climbing down the social ladder. So he intends to marry a rich woman and - murder her.
